rule.name: EAP_SetValueForRefProcessRequest
rule.description: Rule to set to data into ref process request
rule.definition:
if( and( #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!requestId ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!processId ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!runConfigId ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!processControllerMasterId ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!runTimeSchedulerDetailId ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!requestCurrStatus ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!requestMonth ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!requestYear ),
#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!makerId ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!checkerId ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!appianProcessInstanceId ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!isAdhocTrigger ),
#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!createdBy ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!createdOn ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!modifiedBy ), #"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"( ri!modifiedOn ) ), ri!refProcessRequest, 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:EAP}EAP_T_ProcessRequest'( requestId : if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!requestId),index(ri!refProcessRequest,"requestId",{}),ri!requestId), processId : if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!processId),index(ri!refProcessRequest,"processId",{}),ri!processId), runConfigId: if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!runConfigId),index(ri!refProcessRequest,"runConfigId",{}),ri!runConfigId), processControllerMasterId: if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!processControllerMasterId),index(ri!refProcessRequest,"processControllerMasterId",{}),ri!processControllerMasterId), runTimeSchedulerDetailId : if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!runTimeSchedulerDetailId),index(ri!refProcessRequest,"runTimeSchedulerDetailId",{}),ri!runTimeSchedulerDetailId), requestCurrStatus : if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!requestCurrStatus),index(ri!refProcessRequest,"requestCurrStatus",{}),ri!requestCurrStatus), requestMonth : if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!requestMonth),index(ri!refProcessRequest,"requestMonth",{}),ri!requestMonth), requestYear : if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!requestYear),index(ri!refProcessRequest,"requestYear",{}),ri!requestYear),
makerId : if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!makerId),index(ri!refProcessRequest,"makerId",{}),ri!makerId), checkerId: if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!checkerId),index(ri!refProcessRequest,"checkerId",{}),ri!checkerId), appianProcessInstanceId : if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!appianProcessInstanceId),index(ri!refProcessRequest,"appianProcessInstanceId",{}),ri!appianProcessInstanceId), isAdhocTrigger: if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!isAdhocTrigger),index(ri!refProcessRequest,"isAdhocTrigger",{}),ri!isAdhocTrigger), created_by : if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!createdBy),index(ri!refProcessRequest,"created_by",{}),ri!createdBy), created_on : if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!createdOn),index(ri!refProcessRequest,"created_on",{}),ri!createdOn), modified_by : if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!modifiedBy),index(ri!refProcessRequest,"modified_by",{}),ri!modifiedBy), modified_on : if(#"_a-0000e4b2-6487-8000-2b63-01ef9001ef90_3233095"(ri!modifiedOn),index(ri!refProcessRequest,"modified_on",{}),ri!modifiedOn), ) )
